entries.description: Minimum version of SAM CLI has been adjusted from 0.16.0 to 0.32.0 to accommodate new runtime support
Bumped maximum (exclusive) supported SAM CLI version from 0.40.0 to 0.50.0.
SAM Application support for the python3.8 runtime
Reduced plugin size and startup time significantly
SAM Application support for the nodejs12.x runtime
The StatusBar item displaying the current credentials used by the toolkit now shows when no credentials are being used. It can also be clicked to change the Toolkit's active credentials.
The Toolkit now applies configuration changes to the log level when it changes instead of the next time the toolkit is started (#860)
The folder depth within a workspace that SAM Template files are searched for is now configurable. Previously, this was fixed at 2.
